name: skill-wizard
description: Interactive wizard that guides users through creating new Maestro Marketplace-compatible skills and micro-skills. Walks through skill definition (name, description, capabilities), manifest generation with semantic search optimization, SKILL.md scaffolding using Tactical 4-D templates, and directory structure creation. Ensures new skills are discoverable by the registry through rich descriptions and proper capability tagging. Supports both Tier 2 skills (orchestrators with domain expertise) and Tier 3 micro-skills (single-purpose executors with smart error handling).

domain_expertise.skill_design: Best practices for skill architecture, capability naming, description optimization for semantic search
domain_expertise.tactical_4d: Implementation of Tactical 4-D methodology at skill level
domain_expertise.registry_optimization: Crafting descriptions and capabilities that maximize discovery scores

skill_type.description: Whether to create a Tier 2 skill (orchestrator) or Tier 3 micro-skill (executor)

domain.description: The domain this skill operates in (code, marketing, data, etc.) - optional but helpful for examples

interactive.description: Whether to use interactive wizard mode with guided questions

name.description: Skill name in hyphen-case (if non-interactive mode)

description.description: Rich description for semantic discovery (if non-interactive mode)

suggestedNextSkills.reason: After creating basic structure, skill-developer can help implement the full skill logic
